channel.title: United States on Jack Gregory
channel.description: Recent content in United States on Jack Gregory

item.title: Still your grandfather's boiler
item.description: Notes Panel speaker during the “2023 Air Quality Seminar” for the Association of Environmental and Resource Economists at the Online Summer Workshop in Environment, Energy, and Transportation (AERE@OSWEET). See the working paper here.

item.title: Still your grandfather’s boiler
item.description: Through a study of New Source Review, we empirically investigate how the differential treatment of coal boilers shaped the utilization, retirement and emissions of US coal generators.

item.title: Still your grandfather's boiler
item.description: Notes Panel speaker during the “Energy Transition” Parallel Session. See the working paper here.

item.title: Essays on Electricity Economics
item.description: My dissertation leverages electricity data for an economic investigation of three disparate topics: the effects of the COVID-19 pandemic; the implications of government ownership on the exercise of market power in the Australian National Electricity Market; and, the unintended consequences of US Clean Air Act regulation on coal boilers.
